relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare for Public Sector
relatedBlades.subtitle: Protect. Connect. Accelerate.
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's innovative connectivity cloud accelerates Zero Trust architectures, delivers high-performance digital services, and increases operational resilience.

columnContent.title: Protect
columnContent.description:
Mitigate risk with advanced security capabilities

- Mature Zero Trust architectures
- Resilient public-facing applications
- Proactive detection and response

columnContent.title: Connect
columnContent.description:
Power everything with an intelligent connectivity cloud

- Work and learn from anywhere
- Improve network and app performance
- Enhance service resilience

columnContent.title: Accelerate
columnContent.description:
Modernize faster and increase operational efficiency

- Eradicate legacy technology
- Reduce costs and complexity
- Achieve continuous compliance

### __Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency__

CISA selected Cloudflare to strengthen and simplify DNS security for .gov websites.

imageAssetFile.altText: Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency - image
imageAssetFile.title: Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency - image

columnContent.description:
### __Arizona Department of Homeland Security__

Arizona DHS partnered with us to drive their innovative statewide Cyber Readiness Program.

contentfulAsset.description: Arizona Department of Homeland Security - Logo

columnContent.description:
### __Oklahoma OMES__

Cloudflare helps Oklahoma OMES to deliver world-class security for 180 agencies across the state.

imageAssetFile.altText: Oklahoma Office of Management and Enterprise Services - image
imageAssetFile.title: Oklahoma Office of Management and Enterprise Services - image

columnContent.title: U.S. Federal Agency
columnContent.description: A government agency increased availability and eliminated DDoS attacks with help from Cloudflare.

columnContent.title: U.S. Government Agency
columnContent.description: Cloudflare helps a government agency protect financial institutions with curated threat intelligence.

relatedBlades.eyebrowHeading: Cloudflare is your trusted connectivity cloud

columnContent.description:
### __FedRAMP Moderate Authorized__ Cloudflare achieved a FedRAMP Moderate ATO in 2022, and our innovative approach makes our authorized services available around the globe. Learn more
Visit FedRAMP Marketplace

### __CISA Secure by Design Pledge__ Cloudflare signed CISA's pledge as part of our commitment to industry-leading solutions that are secure by design and by default. Learn more
Discover our new bug bounty VIP program

imageAssetFile.altText: CISA Secure by Design Pledge - image
imageAssetFile.title: CISA Secure by Design Pledge - image

contentfulAsset.description: CISA Secure by Design Pledge - image

columnContent.description:
### __WCAG 2.1 AA and Section 508__ Cloudflare published a Voluntary Product Accessibility Template (VPAT) as part of our larger commitment to inclusive technology. Learn more
[Visit the Cloudflare Trust Hub](https://www.cloudflare.com/trust-hub/compliance-resources/)

features.title: Secure DNS
features.description: Cloudflare offers a high-performance Domain Name System (DNS) service that defends against attacks.

features.title: Web app protection
features.description: Block threats and zero-day exploits with an industry-leading web application firewall (WAF).

features.title: DDoS mitigation
features.description: Block the destructive distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks that impact availability and uptime.
